original_text: Thus was all the work of the tabernacle of the tent of the congregation finished: and the children of Israel did according to all that the Lord commanded Moses, so did they.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 이와 같이 성막 곧 회막의 모든 역사를 마치되 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 다 행하고

sentences.original_text: Thus was all the work of the tabernacle
of the tent of the congregation finished
and the children of Israel did
according to all that the Lord commanded Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 모세에게 명령하신 모든 것을 따라
